# Test Explicit Group Membership

## Controls

| CC (Dec) | Label | Range | Choices |
|----------|-------|-------|---------|
| G:osc | OSCILLATOR | | |
| 10 | G:osc: Waveform | 0-3 | Sine, Square, Saw, Triangle |
| 11 | G:osc: Octave | -2-2 | |
| 12 | Filter Cutoff | 0-127 | |
| 13 | G:osc: Detune | 0-127 | |
| 14 | Filter Resonance | 0-127 | |
| 15 | G:osc: Level | 0-127 | |
